verbs.description: Melania Trump 's press office [V: is] slamming the media for their critical coverage of the First Lady in light of yesterday 's policy rollout speech .
[ARG0: Melania Trump 's press office] is [V: slamming] [ARG1: the media] [ARG2: for their critical coverage of the First Lady] [ARGM-ADV: in light of yesterday 's policy rollout speech] .
